name: Noisy Wood
description:
Gah! Who's making so much noise in the wood? Find out by solving the pattern puzzles, & get them out of the wood, in this short 3D Bitsy puzzle rhyming folktale.

To Play

  • Follow the patterns that appear in the sky & walk on only that sequence of tiles to reach the end of the path, and find out who's making the noise.
  • Make a wrong move & you'll end up back at the beginning.
  • Talk to the characters you meet
  • Then go to the exit at the top of each screen.
  • Use arrow keys to move & play through dialogue.

Created using Bitsy 3D by aloelazoe, (a version of Bitsy by Adam Le Doux), for #GamesInTheWoods jam.

Music by me.
